spirit:component.spirit:name: v_tpg

spirit:field.spirit:name: Enable
spirit:field.spirit:description: Master enable for the device interrupt output to the system interrupt controller: 0 = Disabled, 1 = Enabled

spirit:field.spirit:name: CHAN0_INT_ST
spirit:field.spirit:description: Channel 0 (ap_done) Interrupt Status. 0 = No Channel 0 interrupt, 1 = Channel 0 interrupt.

spirit:field.spirit:name: CHAN1_INT_ST
spirit:field.spirit:description: Channel 1 (ap_ready) Interrupt Status. 0 = No Channel 1 interrupt, 1 = Channel 1 interrupt.

spirit:component.spirit:description: An IP generated by Vitis HLS
